'''Kalos''' is the sixth [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 72 Pokémon from Chespin to Volcanion. '''Kalos''' is the sixth [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 72 Pokémon from Chespin to Volcanion.
